title: Uniweb Site Configuration
description: Schema for site.yml files in Uniweb projects

name.description: Site name displayed in browser tab and metadata

foundation.description: Foundation package name. Use 'foundation' for local sibling, or an npm package name

pages.description: Top-level page ordering. Use '...' for rest-of-pages wildcard: [home, about, ...] = home first (homepage), about second, rest after. Without '...' = strict (unlisted hidden from nav). First item becomes homepage

index.description: Homepage folder name. Alternative to 'pages' array - just names the homepage, auto-discovers rest

locales.description: Non-default locales to build. Use '*' to auto-discover from locales directory, or an array of locale codes

oneOf.description: Auto-discover all locales from locales directory

prerender.description: Enable static site generation (SSG). Generates static HTML for each page at build time
